title: Account Deletion Flow
description: Implement a secure account deletion flow with confirmation dialogs, optional data export, and re-authentication before final deletion.
instructions:
Build a complete account deletion system:

1. Create a DeleteAccountScreen accessible from settings
2. Show clear warning about what will be deleted (posts, messages, followers, etc.)
3. Offer optional data export before deletion with progress indicator
4. Require password re-entry for security verification
5. Implement a multi-step confirmation (type 'DELETE' to confirm)
6. Show a countdown or cooling-off period option
7. Handle the deletion API call with proper error handling
8. Navigate to login screen and clear all local data on success

hints.text: Use a Stepper widget or PageView for the multi-step flow to guide users through each stage
Validate the password re-entry by making an API call to verify credentials before proceeding
After successful deletion, use ref.invalidate on auth providers and clear SharedPreferences before navigating to login

commonMistakes.mistake: Not clearing cached data and tokens after account deletion
commonMistakes.consequence: Stale data remains on device, potential security issue if device is shared
commonMistakes.correction: Clear SharedPreferences, secure storage, and image cache before navigating away

commonMistakes.mistake: Allowing form submission while API calls are in progress
commonMistakes.consequence: Multiple deletion requests or confusing user experience
commonMistakes.correction: Disable all buttons and show loading state during async operations
